name: Alea Iacta Est (KoiNip)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump and double jump

O/Left click for light attack

P/Right click for heavy attack

String multiple attacks together for different combos!

Alea Iacta Est is a 2D beat-em-up platform in which the player would have to navigate through various formations of terrain and use the extensive combo system in order to defeat the enemies that block the way in order to reach the end.

Story:

It was the 2nd Great War, battled between the Diaz Kingdom and Sanctus Theocracy. Mercenary Commander, Orlando, was hired by the Diaz Kingdom in leading his squad of mercenaries to overtake the castle, Astra, that is a foothold for the Sanctus Theocracy. Thinking of retiring afterwards, he set off with his group of mercenaries. Fighting through various battlefields, Orlando started losing his men the closer he got, until he was the last one standing. Determined to finish the mission and retire afterwards, he sets off by himself to take the castle.

Created by Eagle Jump Studios

Corey Nambu

Ryan Phan

Evin Menendez Vargas

Flor Hernandez

Ryley Gonzales
